name: Bloody Mary Tomatoes
author: violet
summary: This is a good adult appetizer. Always a hit at parties.
ingredients: 1 pinch celery salt, or to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add tomatoes and cook uncovered until peels start to break, about 10 seconds
Drain in a colander and immediately immerse in ice water for several minutes to stop the cooking process
Drain and slip skins off each tomato
Combine tomatoes, celery, and olives in a bowl; pour in enough vodka to completely cover
Marinate in the refrigerator, 8 hours to overnight
Strain and sprinkle celery salt over tomato mixture
